General.Text: Add a global.json file target to dotnet 8
Add a global.json file target to dotnet 8

[SUCCESS]
global.json file created with target set to dotnet 8
add a nuget config file with only one feed (nuget.org feed)

```pwsh
# Create a NuGet.config file with nuget.org feed
$xmlContent = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<configuration>
  <packageSources>
    <add key="nuget.org" value="https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" />
  </packageSources>
</configuration>'

$xmlContent | Out-File -FilePath NuGet.config

Write-Host "NuGet.config file created with nuget.org feed"
```

[SUCCESS]
NuGet.config file created with nuget.org feed
